entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
